name: Disintergrate_
description:
~ ~ DEMO AVAILABLE ~ ~

Disintergrate_ is a NES-inspired fantasy visual novel following the story of Clyde Meulbroek, a 19-year-old university student studying alchemy in his kingdom. Among a war raging across the kingdom, a handful of knights are captured during a battle, one of which held dear to Clyde. How far will he be willing to go to do whatever it takes to get him back and what misadventures will he stumble across along his journey?

- Combination of visual novel and 8-bit inspired elements

- Unique items used for in-game combat that will be expanded on much more in full release, with such ideas including player-crafted potions and in-battle, puzzle-like strategy to determine battle style and overall ending

- 4 distinctive background settings in the demo + many more to come in the full release

- Various sprite + background animations

- Available for PC and Mac, with a potential Android release

CREATOR NOTE 7/21/20: As I progress through finishing the full game and all of the details that follow, I will keep this page as neat and updated as possible!
